title: 4IR Training
short_desc: Training for the Fourth Industrial Revolution (4IR) and skill development.

details.description: Comprehensive training programs designed to equip professionals with the skills required for Industry 4.0, including automation, AI, and smart technologies.
programs: ToT Development Program for Community Nursing Program with Different Nursing Institute

title: Environmental and Social Consultancy
short_desc: Comprehensive environmental and social impact assessments.

details.description: Providing consultancy services to assess environmental and social impacts for various development projects.
services: Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA), IEE, Baseline Survey
Social Assessment including IPSA, LA, RP, Socio-Economic Survey
Environmental Auditing and Due Diligence Assessment
Impact Evaluation Studies, Noise and Air Modeling

title: Rural Roads and Highways Consultancy
short_desc: Consultancy for environmental, social, and economic aspects of roads and highways.

details.description: Helping infrastructure projects meet environmental and social standards while ensuring sustainable development.
services: Baseline Survey, Economic and Social Studies
Social Assessment including IPSA, LA, RP, Socio-Economic Survey

title: Development Consultancy
short_desc: Assessment and planning for sustainable development projects.

details.description: Offering expert advice and assessments for sustainable development and economic growth projects.
services: Baseline Survey, Economic and Social Studies
Social Impact Assessment for EMP and SMP

title: Oil and Gas Industry
short_desc: Consulting services for oil and gas sector projects.

details.description: Providing a range of services for oil and gas exploration, extraction, and processing projects.

title: Water Resource Management & Agriculture Consultancy
short_desc: Water management, hydrology, and agricultural consultancy.

details.description: Specialized consultancy services in water resource management, agriculture, and sustainable development.

title: Dredging
short_desc: Dredging, riverbank management, and port services.

details.description: Providing sustainable dredging solutions for maintaining waterways and preventing sedimentation.

title: Residential and Commercial Building Development
short_desc: Construction and development of commercial and residential buildings.
